H0.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Draftsman

H1.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Editor

H2.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Committee Member

H3.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Writer

A4.text: Jefferson was the primary author of the Declaration of Independence.

A5.text: Jefferson was chosen by the Committee of Five to author the Declaration of Independence.

A6.text: Jefferson then consulted the other members of the Committee of Five who offered minor changes, and then produced another copy incorporating these alterations.
